intialClasses

Class MClick

  • java.lang.Object
    • intialClasses.MClick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, EventListener

    public class MClick
extends Object
implements MouseListener
    A MouseListener that enables or disables a group of TextArea objects, depending on its mode.
    Author:
    Jonah Tash

    • Constructor Detail

      • MClick

        public MClick(TextField tf1,
      TextField tf2,
      TextField tf3,
      TextField tf4,
      TGMenu menu,
      int i)
        Parameters:
        tf1 - A TextArea to be enabled/disabled.
        tf2 - A TextArea to be enabled/disabled.
        tf3 - A TextArea to be enabled/disabled.
        tf4 - A TextArea to be enabled/disabled.
        menu - The parent TGMenu of this MClick.
        i - The mode for this MClick, 0 for disabling and 1 for enabling
